entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then snow. Snow mixed with rain before morning. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 8 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain showers or flurries. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with rain changing to rain showers in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 50 gusting to 80 in the morning. High plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 early in the evening then becoming light near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023
